snippet: Even if you’re not planning to renovate your kitchen before you list your house, you’ll want to make it look as well maintained as possible.
abstract: Market Ready Q&A on whether to repair water-damaged kitchen ceiling before selling a home.
lead_paragraph: Even if you’re not planning to renovate your kitchen before you list your house, you’ll want to make it look as well maintained as possible.

headline.seo: Advice for Putting Your Home in Shape Before You Sell
headline.main: Should We Repair Our Water-Damaged Kitchen Ceiling?
headline.print_headline: Should We Repair Our Water-Damaged Kitchen Ceiling?
